name: Tunnel
description: An underground passage provides access through mountains or other obstacles. The controlled environment allows for year-round travel, while the enclosed nature creates opportunities for defense or ambush.
atmosphere: Echoing footsteps bounce off stone walls while dripping water creates a rhythm of enclosed travel. The air carries the scent of stone, earth, and the promise of controlled passage. Every sound echoes with amplified importance. Your skin feels the cool stone and the weight of enclosed danger. The taste of controlled access and mountain mystery fills your mouth.
